articles.title: Indian police find Russian woman and her 2 daughters living in isolated forest cave
articles.description: Police in India’s southern Karnataka state say they have found a Russian woman and her two young daughters living in isolation in a remote forest cave
articles.content:
Police in India’s southern Karnataka state say they have found a Russian woman and her two young daughters living in isolation in a remote forest cave
Indian policemen rescue Nina Kutina, 40, a Russian woman, from a cave in forest area of Ramtirtha h... [2611 chars]
